actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for home-care services provided by a taxpayer to members of the family.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for home health care expenditures for: (1) medical care for elderly family members, or services enabling such individuals to live in the taxpayer's principal residence rather than an institution; and (2) the construction, reconstruction, or renovation of such residence to remove barriers which would prevent such individuals from living in such residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for home-care services provided by a taxpayer to members of the family.
